fields.name: Guided Meditation & Energy Balancing
fields.description: A calming session combining breath awareness and subtle energy work to clear emotional blocks and restore inner peace. Ideal for stress and emotional fatigue.

fields.name: Ayurvedic Wellness Session
fields.description: A customized treatment that includes Ayurvedic consultation, herbal compress massage, and lifestyle guidance based on your dosha type.

fields.name: Herbal Nutrition Consultation
fields.description: In-depth assessment followed by a tailored nutrition plan using plant-based remedies and natural supplements to boost vitality and balance.

fields.name: Digestive Rejuvenation Protocol
fields.description: Focused on gut health, this package includes a herbal tea blend, nutritional coaching, and reflex-stimulation techniques.

fields.name: Therapeutic Body Alignment
fields.description: Physical therapy meets energy healing: manual manipulation combined with Reiki to release tension and align body posture holistically.

fields.name: Holistic Rehab Intensive
fields.description: A comprehensive program for chronic physical imbalances, merging physiotherapy with chakra-centered healing for full-body renewal.

fields.name: Mindfulness & Reflexology Session
fields.description: Gentle footwork targeting key zones while guiding the client in breathwork and present-moment awareness. Ideal for emotional reset.

fields.name: Spiritual Release Therapy
fields.description: Combines acupressure through the feet and intuitive coaching to let go of emotional patterns and spark spiritual clarity.
